mapper.select: SELECT a.bookingSeq ,a.bkCheckin ,a.bkCheckout ,a.bkAdult ,a.bkChild ,a.bkTotalPrice ,b.memberName ,c.roomName ,c.roomTypeCD ,c.roomPrice FROM hotelbooking a LEFT JOIN member b ON a.bookingSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT join roomdetail c ON a.bookingSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE a.member_seq = #{member_seq}
